course_title: Introduction to Technical Production - INTRO TECH PROD

sections.comments: If this section if FULL or BLOCKED please sign up for the corresponding wait list section - THTR 150B, Section WL1. Once you have registered in the wait list there is no need to contact the Department. Your registration will be switched to the parent section when space becomes available. Preference may be given to Majors, Minors, or Honours students in Theatre or Film. For more information about Department of Theatre and Film wait lists please visit: http://theatrefilm.ubc.ca/undergraduate/undergraduate-courses/how-to-wait-list-a-course/

description: Foundation study of production technologies for the performing arts.
